messages.title: More Police, Safer Streets
messages.content: A Liberal Democrat government will invest 1 billion pounds in community policing, meaning more bobbies on the beat in Newham.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the 50 billion pound Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Invest 1 billion pounds in community policing so more bobbies on the beat.
80% renewable electricity by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
30 billion pound extra for schools and hire 20,000 more teachers.
Free childcare from 9 months and share parental leave.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for the Liberal Democrats and stopping Brexit is more important than ever.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the 50 billion pound Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.education: 30 billion pound extra for schools and hire 20,000 more teachers.
issues.environment: 80% renewable electricity by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
issues.socialWelfare: Free childcare from 9 months and share parental leave.

leaflet.personalStatement: I bet you are as frustrated as I am with the way things are going in our country. We deserve better.

endorsements.endorsement: Paul is a great candidate, who will work tirelessly for Newham.

quotes.text: You need someone who will deliver a brighter future and stop Brexit. Vote for Paul Reynolds.
